data.title: Efrat Rapid Response Initiative
data.meta_description: Help Us Raise $208,000 for Efrat’s Rapid Response Team! EFRAT’S RAPID RESPONSE INITIATIVE Help provide the front line volunteers with items they need to keep their communities safe! What we provide: CERAMIC VESTS TACTICAL HELMETS THERMAL DRONES MEDICAL KITS SAFETY GEAR CAR SIRENS/ PA SYSTEMS THERMAL BINOCULARS AIMING LASERS TACTICAL GEAR MUCH MORE https://www.youtube.com/embed/iTMFOZLGzC0 לתרומה […]
data.text:
The recent attacks in the south highlight an underestimated vulnerability and lack of essential resources that place communities that live longside arab towns in highly dangerous situations.

Rapid Response Teams, known as Kitat Konenut, are frontline responders to these attacks on Israeli communities.
